title: Media | Philip Zanghi Talks Indian Tabac, Indian Motorcycles
itunes:title: Media | Philip Zanghi Talks Indian Tabac, Indian Motorcycles
description:
Philip Zanghi might not be a household name in the Cigar Industry, but he was the man behind Indian Tabac that started in 1992. In 1995, he partnered with Rocky Patel and parted ways from the brand and the partnership in 1997.
Following the successful launch of Debonaire Cigars, Mr. Zanghi is set to release Indian Motorcycles Cigars in 2015...
How does this all tie together, tune in to The Cigar Authority, Saturday at 12 Noon to find out!
www.thecigarauthority.com
Click the RED push to watch live in the upper right hand portion of the website. We go live at 12 Noon, Mr. Zanghi joins us at 12:30.
